item.title: US-160 West/US-285 South - Monte Vista

item.title: US-285 South at US-160/CO-15
item.description: US-285 south at US-160/CO-15 in Monte Vista. US-285 south joins US-160 east to Alamosa.

item.title: US-285 South at US-160
item.description: US-285 south at US-160 in Monte Vista. Turn right on US-160 West for Del Norte; left on US-160 East/US-285 South for Alamosa.
